summary:
The Shiv Of Peerless Farewells is a weapon I made for my own amusement but thought I'd share it with the community.

Launching enemies and NPC's across the map is fun :P.

Fully disenchantable so you can use a weapon of your own choice (with damage).
descriptionHtml:
The Shiv Of Peerless Farewells is a weapon I made for my own amusement but thought I'd share it with the community.

Launching enemies and NPC's across the map is fun :P.

Fully disenchantable so you can use a weapon of your own choice (with damage).

Item can be found on a work bench in Riverwood (the one behind the mill next to the river).
author: teioh33
